Module com.example.petcarecab302qu
Package com.example.petcarecab302qu.controller

Class NavigationController

java.lang.Object
com.example.petcarecab302qu.controller.NavigationController
Direct Known Subclasses:
DietController, ExerciseController, HomeController, MainHomeController, PetProfileController, ScheduleController, SettingController
public class NavigationController extends Object
Controller class for managing the navigation bar in the PETHUB application. Loads the navigation bar from an FXML file and adds it to the view.
